deposit.label: Pay Deposit ($29 Ticket)
deposit.termsShort: Deposit is required to submit a dispatch request.
deposit.termsLong: Your requested time is a request window, not confirmed until we reply. Deposit becomes non-refundable once scheduling/sourcing begins.

responseExpectations.headline: Priority queue
responseExpectations.line: Once you send, you’re in the priority queue. Expect a confirmation text.

scheduling.note: You’re requesting a window. We confirm or propose the earliest available slot.

pricing.note: Ranges shown are examples. Final quote depends on scope, access, and severity.

services.name: Single commercial bathroom deep clean
services.description: Heavy reset: fixtures, floors, touch points, odor-focused detailing.

services.name: Multiple bathrooms / larger restroom area
services.description: Multi-stall restrooms, multiple rooms, or larger footprint commercial spaces.

services.name: Move-out / turnover restroom reset
services.description: Tenant turnover, lease transitions, or property reconditioning.

addons.name: Odor / severity assessment
addons.description: Strong odor, unknown severity, or risk factors. Confirmed after details.

addons.name: Floor build-up / grout detailing
addons.description: Extra floor pass for heavy build-up and grout attention.

addons.name: After-hours / restricted access window
addons.description: Late night access, tight windows, special entry rules.

addons.name: Restock basics coordination (paper/soap)
addons.description: We coordinate basic restock with the crew if needed.

urgency.name: Rush
urgency.disclaimerLine: Rush requests include a higher coordination fee and tighter scheduling.

urgency.name: Emergency / Same-Day
urgency.disclaimerLine: Emergency / same-day is subject to availability. Any rush fee is confirmed after details.

seo.siteTitle: Commercial Bathroom Cleaning Chicago | Priority Dispatch Deep Cleaning
seo.siteDescription: High-intent dispatch request form for commercial bathroom cleaning in Chicago. Configure service, request a time window, pay deposit, and send dispatch details in one tap.
